# TPoDT No Rippers

#### Written in 2012 July.

[Original package](https://defacto2.net/f/ab2709e)

```
╔══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║ Program...: [-                         ] ║ Release Type.: [-               ] ║
║ Company...: [-                         ] ║ Release Date.: [07-07-2012      ] ║
║ Cracker...: [TPoDT                     ] ║ Release Size.: [~184kb          ] ║
║ Protection: [-                         ] ╩ Platform.....: [WinAll          ] ║
║ Web.......: [http://tpodt.net16.net/forum                                  ] ║
╚══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝

 ╔═RELEASE NOTES:══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
 ║                                                                             ║
 ║    It  has  come  to  our attention that we're flagged as a RIPPER team.    ║
 ║    Obviously this is untrue...                                              ║
 ║                                                                             ║
 ║    If  you  look at both the keygens you will (at first) notice that the    ║
 ║    TPoDT keygen has a HWID field, TSRh has none.                            ║
 ║                                                                             ║
 ║    Next  to  this  TSRh KeyGen has a chiptune, TPoDT does not have this.    ║
 ║    TSRh  KeyGen  is  packed with Upack and compiled in ASM, TPoDT one is    ║
 ║    unpacked and was compiled in MingW (C++)                                 ║
 ║                                                                             ║
 ║    I  included  screenshots  and if you're still unconvinced: I included    ║
 ║    the source of the TPoDT KeyGen (sad it has come to this)                 ║
 ║                                                                             ║
 ║    This  NFO  was (probably) done by some lame ripper team called 'SHWZ'    ║
 ║    see the topic at SnD Request board:                                      ║
 ║                                                                             ║
 ║    http://snd.astalavista.ms/board/index.php?showtopic=7360                 ║
 ║                                                                             ║
 ╚═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝


 ╔═INSTALL NOTES:══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╗
 ║                                                                             ║
 ║    This is pure NFO, no install needed                                      ║
 ║                                                                             ║
 ╚═════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════╝
 ```
